_header: The Jews Jesu Christ to upbraid
_description: Gospel for Monday after Third Sunday in Lent, in the ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle

BLHar4196.First Lines: þe iewes ihesu crist to vpbraydIlkone till oþer oft siþes said…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …Þus on þis molde he schewid his mightIn sere meruailes vnto mens sight
BLHar4196.Note: Preceded by Latin, “DIxerunt pharisei ad ihesum.”
BLHar4196.Attributed Title: fferia secunda post dominicam iii quadragesime secundum Lucam (rubric, f. 48va)
